metadata.title: CVE-2018-6135 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Lack of clearing the previous site before loading alerts from a new one inBlink in Google Chrome prior to 67.0.3396.62 allowed a remote attacker toperform domain spoofing via a crafted HTML page.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
oxide-qt: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
